name: TGA
description:
[I didn't have much time to make this so there's a lot of bugs. So if your experience was bad i'm sorry its barely been a while since i started learning.  No music in the levels itself cause i have never made music before(i made one for menu thou).]

The premise was that you would awake in a random place, your told to escape with the help of a person who's above you. But little do you know the who the guy above truly is... ( I mean is not hard to guess really).
